headline: Former US Sec. of State Backs McCormick in Appearance
author: Tory Gates
sentences: Recent polls show McCormick and heart surgeon and TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz vying for the lead in the race for the GOP nomination, with a significant percentage of Republican voters still undecided.

Former US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo was in Mahoning Township this week to support a US Senate candidate.
Pompeo spoke at a rally at Frosty Valley Resort on behalf of Republican candidate David McCormick.
Pompeo praise McCormick as a fellow conservative who will work to represent Pennsylvanians.
